name: Immortal Monster
description:
This is my entry for GDL - August 2022 Jam whose theme : Death is not the end... Death is progress.

You play as immortal monster who can auto revive itself after it dies. Element which kills the monster will be the element the monster absorb on its revival. This will also affect its shot which can be used to solve puzzles.

Controls:

NumPad keys = move monster

Z = Jumps

X = Shoots (shots depends on current color/element)

R = Restarts current level

Enter = Pauses or confirm

F8 = Takes screenshot

Features:

- 8 directional shooting.

- Immortality.

- Killed by fire will change monster's element into fire and killed by ice will change monster's element into ice.

- Different shot depending on current color/element.


Enjoy this short puzzle platformer game!
